carmen 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Convert a character vector of IP addresses to integers

Source: R/crm_ip_to_int.R
crm_ip_to_int.Rd

Note: integer IP addresses are stored as a double vector to prevent integer overflows.

crm_ip_to_int(ip)

Arguments

ip

A character vector of IP addresses (e.g. "130.191.166.222").

Value

A numeric vector of integer IP addresses.

See also

Other carmen: crm_clear_cache(), crm_locate()

Examples

crm_ip_to_int("130.191.166.222")

#> [1] 2193598174
crm_ip_to_int(generator::r_ipv4_addresses(100))
